-- | Haskell on Gtk rails - Gtk-based controller for MVC applications
--   
@package keera-hails-mvc-controller
@version 0.0.3.3


-- | Conditions to update a program can go from the view to the model and
--   from the model to the view. Future versions must "ignore" this
--   completely and simply work even if the constraints are of kind
--   Model-to-Model or View-to-View
module Hails.MVC.Controller.ConditionDirection
data ConditionDirection
VM :: ConditionDirection
MV :: ConditionDirection
